#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <cassert>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
typedef vector < int > vi;
typedef vector < vi > vvi;

#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

const int MAXN = (int)(1e6 + 9);
const int MOD  = (int)(1e9 + 7);

LL nCr[MAXN][9];

inline void go() {
	memset(nCr,0LL,sizeof(nCr));
	for(int i = 1;i < MAXN;++i) {
		for(int j = 0;j < 9;++j) {
			if(j == 0 || j == i) nCr[i][j] = 1LL;
			else nCr[i][j] = ( nCr[i - 1][j] + nCr[i - 1][j - 1] ) % MOD;
		}
	}
}

int tc,n;

inline LL solve() {
	LL ret = 0LL;
    for(int i = 1;i <= n;++i) {
        if((n - i) % 2 == 0) {
        	if((n - i) >= 6) {
        	ret = ret + nCr[((n - i)/2) - 1][5];
        	if(ret >= MOD) ret = ret % MOD;
          }
        }
    }
    return ret;
}

int main () {
    go();
    scanf("%d",&tc);
    while(tc--) {
    	scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n < 13) printf("0\n");
        else printf("%lld\n",solve());
    }
	return 0;
}
